summary.description: Summary or overview the describes the policy. Summary text is intended as guidance to the author and not included in the published version.

content.description: Text content of the policy. For policies/procedures used by the Policy Builder app, this will contain the template text in markdown format. Stored in raw data.

applicable.description: Indicates if policy or procedure is applicable based on the organization's current risk and compliance needs. A Policy that is not applicable may become applicable later as the organization's requirements and maturity change.

adopted.description: Indicates if policy or procedure has been adopted. Only adopted policies and procedures are included in the published view of the Policy Builder app.
